Volunteers needed for Red Cross Meals on Wheels in Hawke’s Bayhttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/volunteers-needed-for-red-cross-meals-on-wheels-in-hawkes-bay/TFOL543P6ZGDVLXBYE5XF4WPNI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/volunteers-needed-for-red-cross-meals-on-wheels-in-hawkes-bay/TFOL543P6ZGDVLXBYE5XF4WPNI/ 'They’re full of stories, things from their past. It's a real buzz.' Tue, 24 Sep 2024 00:26:46 +0000 Meals on Wheels volunteer Linda Hay (right) with meal recipient Gwen Arnold. Red Cross needs more volunteers for Meals on Wheels to help with an ongoing shortage in Hawke's Bay.
